author: mac
content: What an awfulexperience with Nuffnang. I didn't know if it's in your niche or what but my personal blog earned 24 pesos in just 2 weeks with just a small traffic in Nuffnang.  I think it is the advertisement itself. The advertisement that showed on my blog is PS Bank and someone clicked it and gave me 20 pesos for a single click. Just don't stop blogging :D
